description:
Within the last week run_tests -N has started producing sporadic Out of Memory errors.

http://paste.openstack.org/show/1006/
title: Getting OOM errors recently

comments.content:
Within the last week run_tests -N has started producing sporadic Out of Memory errors.

http://paste.openstack.org/show/1006/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris

comments.content: This doesn't seem to affect the Hudson box, so I guess it's due to limited memory. How much RAM do you have ? Is it always the same test failing ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: @Rick: are you still having those issues ? If yes, could you provide the information requested above ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Missing required info, please reopen (set status back to New) if you still have the issue and can provide requested info.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
